description:
Whether you’re repairing a flat on a single-track epic, or you burp your tire on a dodgy landing, this little pump will get your large volume tires topped up and ready to go.

  • Durable aluminum construction
  • Ergonomic CNC machined handle
  • Fully sealed construction stands up to nasty weather
  • Lever-lock head works on both Presta and Schrader valves
  • Retractable hose tucks into the handle and makes inflation easy
  • Includes a bottle cage mount
name: Cannondale Dirt Mini Pump
